paper.title: Algorithms for Enumerating All Perfect, Maximum and Maximal Matchings in Bipartite Graphs
paper.venue: International Symposium on Algorithms and Computation
paper.abstract: For a bipartite graph G = (V, E), (1) perfect, (2) maximum and (3) maximal matchings are matchings (1) such that all vertices are incident to some matching edges, (2) whose cardinalities are maximum among all matchings, (3) which are contained in no other matching. In this paper, we present three algorithms for enumerating these three types of matchings. Their time complexities are O(|V |) per a matching.
